definition: to assign/to entrust (a task)/to give/to bestow
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.
sentences.chinese: 员工流动赋予科技产业流动性，周转性和能量。

sentences.english: Creativity is the soul of the advertisement, which endows the advertisement with vitality and life.
sentences.chinese: 创意是广告的灵魂，是赋予广告精神与生命的活动。

sentences.english: He was given a fresh refill.
Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 寿被赋予慈溪太后她皇后绣挂毯，八老庆祝生日。

sentences.english: The cardigans and leggings as soft as silk endow ladies with particular charm.
sentences.chinese: 柔情似水的毛衣裙装赋予女性独特的魅力。

sentences.english: A honey character, from lees contact, gives the wine depth.
sentences.chinese: 酒渣沉淀后获取的蜜汁，赋予了其丰富的酒体。

sentences.english: I believe the commune in community is what gives meaning and depth to my life.
sentences.chinese: 我相信是这种邻里间的关系赋予我生命的意义和深度。

sentences.english: Thus it is the densification that produces the higher tensile strength for T700 fibers.
sentences.chinese: 所以致密化赋予了T700较高的拉伸强度。

sentences.english: Only one of three women in the Berlusconi government had a heavyweight job.
sentences.chinese: 在贝卢斯科尼政府的三名女性，只有一名被赋予重任。

sentences.english: Its fragrant scent will give you unlimited imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她将赋予您馥郁的芬芳令人悠然上神往。

sentences.english: Riches, the dumb god, that givest all men tongues.
sentences.chinese: 无声的上帝，赋予所有人以语言。

sentences.english: He thought bestowal could be reduced to appraisal.
sentences.chinese: 他认为赋予可以被简化为评价。

sentences.english: The screws also promote a particular sense of perspective.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝钉还赋予我们一种从整体出发来看问题的意识。
剥蚀赋予了它蜂巢状的外形。

sentences.english: This gives XP a black and orange look.
sentences.chinese: 它赋予XP黑色与橘色结合的外观。

sentences.english: The code to vest the government with unrestricted power is a "bad" code.
sentences.chinese: 赋予政府不受约束之权力的规矩是“恶”法。

definition: to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
mission/long-term task to which one devotes oneself/a calling
